channel.title: Cant connect
channel.description:
alright i portfowarded my ports are open i have my no-ip opend i have everything down but still says "error connecting to server" idk wht im doing wrong if any1 can help me i would really like that thank you
i have teamviewer and msn pritchett.aaron@yahoo.com

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @xxterror95xx xxterror95xx
item.description:
@xxterror95xx wrote:

lol we have like the opposite problems my problem is i can connect others can’t ok what you need to do i think is open up client.java search for your //server and edit that ip to 127.0.0.1 and the ip under that line to 0.0.0.0 save and compile and if that didint work then open gui and change the ip there too to 127.0.0.1

and if you can remember what that guy did to make people be able to connect can u pls tell me also lol i got msn its hellykid9595@hotmail.com add me there if u have it and it will be easier to help eachother

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect

item.description:
@xxterror95xx wrote:

well you might need to do your enviremental variables go to server tuts and at the top theres a how to make a server guide and look for the part i said u need to do maybe itsthat is the problem if not maybe you didint change the ip and it is trying to connect to someones server

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @Exussit Exussit
item.description:
@Exussit wrote:

If you’re hosting off your own computer and not a VPS, you need to connect via local host i.e. 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 because no-ip is your dns and it’s routing from your own ip if it’s off your computer.
(other players connect via the dns e.g. servername.no-ip.org)

Read full topic
